code: @Test public void testTimeout() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World").     sendFile(getFtpUrl(), "Hello World", "hello.txt").     mock.assertIsSatisfied(). }
public void configure() throws Exception {     from(getFtpUrl()).to("mock:result"). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from(getFtpUrl()).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
